New Records: Qatar ended India's 15-game unbeaten home run in FIFA World Cup 2026 Qualifiers
Key Match Events: Moustafa Mashal scored the opening goal in the 4th minute
Amrinder made several crucial saves, including denying Akram Afif
Almoez Ali scored the second goal in the 47th minute
Yousuf Abdurisag scored the third goal in the 63rd minute
Pre-Game Insights: India aimed to maintain their unbeaten home record
Qatar focused on dominating possession and creating chances
Post-Match Reflections: Igor Stimac expressed frustration with the loss
Sunil Chhetri was substituted in the 84th minute
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at Bhubaneswar in Odisha
India's next opponent is Afghanistan in March 2024
